div.p: Mr. Bond has the Honor to inform The Insurance Company of North America, that He has read in a London Evening Paper of The 1st, of Feby. a Letter from Mr.Nepeanto a respectable House at Liverpool, dated 25. Jany: giving Assurances that the Rt. Hon: The Lords Com: of The Admiralty had ordered a Convoy to sail from Spithead on the 1stof March, to call off Falmouth, for such ships bound to North America, as may be assembled there from Liverpool Glasgow &Bristol. __
Mr. Bond feels Himself happy in this Opportunity of communicating so speedily, this satisfactory Intelligence.
